      • validateCustomSmelt

        public static boolean validateCustomSmelt(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack stack)
        Validate that the given item stack is actually smeltable via a custom STB smelting recipe. E.g. this will prevent the smelting of plain gunpowder as if it were Iron Dust, even though Iron Dust uses gunpowder for its material representation.
        Parameters:
        stack - the stack to check
        Returns:
        true if this item is smeltable
